Body Lotion

A lightweight ultra-hydrating body lotion infused with Shea Butter and Argan Oil to lock in moisture and soften skin with each use.

Body Wash

Hydrating body wash that exfoliates and soothes. Available in three signature scents:

Supreme Oak

A warm, rich and relaxing blend of sweet almond layered with luxurious notes of bourbon and birch.

Aluminum-free Deodorant

Formulated without harsh ingredients and made especially for your skin and underarm hair.

For best use

Apply to damp skin using a washcloth or loofah to build a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Apply BEVEL Moisturizing Body Lotion immediately after bathing to lock in moisture.

BODY LOTION


KEY INGREDIENTS
- Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) - Proven to reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone, dry skin, and rough texture.
Vitamin E - Helps prevent dry, itchy, flaking skin by promoting healing and moisturization.
- Shea Butter - Used for generations as a deep, non-greasy moisturizer that quickly absorbs into the skin. Shea Butter is also known to reduce scarring, uneven skin tones, and dark spots.
- Argan Oil - Packed with Vitamin E, omega fatty acids, and linoleic acids, which work hard to moisturize and soften your skin without leaving a sticky residue or causing irritation.

MADE WITHOUT
Harsh, Drying chemicals

FULL INGREDIENTS
Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Petrolatum, Isopropyl Isostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Polyethylene, Panthenol, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Behenyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Dimethiconol, Propylparaben, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Disodium Edta, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil.


BODY WASH


KEY INGREDIENTS
- Hydrated Silica - A naturally occurring mineral that gently exfoliates the skin to help prevent and reduce bumps and ingrown hairs.
- Jojoba Esters - Provides gentle exfoliation of rough, flaky skin while leaving a soft, moisturized, non-oily finish.
- Charcoal - Pulls bacteria, dirt, and other toxins to the skin’s surface to wash away impurities for the deepest of cleans.
- Argan Oil - Packed with omega fatty acids, vitamin E, and linoleic acids, which work hard to moisturize and soften your skin without irritation or soapy residue.

MADE WITHOUT
Parabens, Artificial Dyes, Phthalates, Gluten

FULL INGREDIENTS
Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Acrylates Coplymer, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance, Sodium Chloride, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Stearyl Stearate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium Edta, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Jojoba Esters, Charcoal Powder, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Iron Oxides.


EXFOLIATING BAR SOAP


KEY INGREDIENTS
- Pumice - A natural exfoliant that reduce dead skin cells and cleans pores without irritating sensitive skin.
- Jojoba Seed Powder - Provides gentle exfoliation of rough, flaky skin while leaving a soft, moisturized, non-oily finish.
- Cocoa Butter - Packed with fatty acids that form a protective barrier over the skin to hold in long-lasting moisture.
- Shea Butter - Used for generations as a deep, non-greasy moisturizer that quickly absorbs into the skin. Shea butter is also known to reduce scarring, hyperpigmentation and dark spots.

MADE WITHOUT
Sulfates, Parabens, Dyes, Phthalates, EDTA, Petrochemical, Synthetic Fragrances

FULL INGREDIENTS
Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Pumice, Fragrance, Sodium Gluconate, Palm Acid, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Powder, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Chloride, Titanium Dioxide, Palm Kernel Acid, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Elettaria Cardamomum Seed Oil, Canarium Luzonicum Gum Nonvolatiles, Myristica Fragrans (Nutmeg) Kernel Oil, Schinus Terebinthifolius Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Citral, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Iron Oxides.


ALUMINUM-FREE DEODORANT


KEY INGREDIENTS
- Coconut Oil - A natural oil that helps prevent the loss of protein and vital moisture from your hair.
- Shea Butter - Used for generations as a deep, non-greasy moisturizer that quickly absorbs into the skin without clogging pores (which can lead to ingrown hairs). Shea butter is also known to reduce scarring, uneven skin tones, and dark spots.

MADE WITHOUT
Aluminum, Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates, Alcohol, Talc, Synthetic Fragrances

FULL INGREDIENTS
Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ozokerite, Tapioca Starch, Sodium Bicarbonate, Magnesium Hydroxide, Fragrance, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Elettaria Cardamomum Seed Oil, Canarium Luzonicum Gum Nonvolatiles, Myristica Fragrans (Nutmeg) Kernel Oil, Schinus Terebinthifolia Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Piroctone Olamine, Citral, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil.
